attributes.action: Free the North – hold a referendum for a devolved 'North of England Parliament'
attributes.additional_details:
I call on the Government to hold a referendum for full devolution to the North of England. This would take place on the same day, in all of the constituencies of the following official regions of England:
- North East England
- North West England
- Yorkshire and the Humber

Following a successful referendum, a ‘North of England Parliament’ would have powers over the following areas:
- Health
- Education
- Economic Development
- Transport
- The Environment
- Agriculture
- Local Government
- Taxes
attributes.background:
Government should support fair and democratic representation by holding a referendum in the North of England for full devolution.

A ‘North of England Parliament’ is the only way to truly represent the best interests of the people of the North of England.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/555283
